body: Also, their names are Natsumi Hinata (eldest), Mizuki Hinata (middle), and Yuuki Hinata (youngest). There's another doujin of Natsumi getting banged in a toilet on a beach, and Yuuki has two other doujins as well. Mizuki as far as I'm aware only appears in this one.

To get a gist of the story. The tallest girl is the elder sister, the middle one the second, and obviously, the loli is the youngest. The guy is the elder sister's boyfriend.

The second sister seems to be quite the slut as it's said she slept with every boy in her class. You can obviously see her initiating sex with her sister's man. She says she wants to taste his cock and that her sister is playing in the water so she won't notice anyway. As she's about to mount the guy, his girlfriend (the oldest sister) barges, none too pleased that her sister is about to have her way first. It's her man so she wants first dibs.
FINALLLY! FUCK THAT LITTLE SMUG BITCH!
